trans-unit.source: When applied to a <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> object, enables an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"></xref> object to discover custom <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Quando aplicado a um <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>objeto, permite que um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"> </xref> objeto para descobrir personalizado <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext>objetos.</xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> </xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext>tipo.</xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext>

trans-unit.source: The type of the reflection context.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de contexto de reflexão.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the custom <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionContext> object.
An instance of the custom reflection context.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do contexto de reflexão personalizados.
